briefDescription: UDAAN is the main activity centre of a non profit trust: Foundation for Spastic and Mentally Handicapped Persons (FSMHPÂ®). UDAAN is one of Delhi's foremost research based NPO for Training, Rehabilitation and Early Medical Intervention of moderate to severe physically and mentally challenged children to lead a better quality of life, and to help them return to their rightful place in society and gainful employment wherever possible. We also help and guide parents/guardians of these special children regarding diagnosis and evaluation of brain-related disabilities, home management and selection of special schools. UDAAN has helped 1500 + neurodevelopment delayed children  over time by providing intensive one-to-one rehabilitation which includes physiotherapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, special education, hand functioning and activities of daily living training.
